summary: All type definitions, type guards, constants, scenarios, and SDK re-exports match spec exactly. TypeScript compiles without errors. All 10 tests pass.

acceptance_criteria.reason: npx tsc --noEmit completed with no errors

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Type guards work correctly with TypeScript narrowing
acceptance_criteria.reason: All 5 type guards present with correct signatures and narrowing types
All SDK type re-exports present: 8 types + 6 error classes from @getalby/sdk/nwc, LightningInvoice from bolt11, LnUrlPayResponse+ZapArgs from lnurl, FiatCurrencyInfo from fiat
Both CONSTANTS and SCENARIOS use 'as const'
All types have JSDoc comments and unit annotations
